articles.title: LoyalBoards Features Analysis
articles.description: A deep dive into the powerful features of LoyalBoards, from interactive feedback boards to advanced analytics.
articles.content:
1. Interactive Feedback Boards

  • Public & Private Boards
    Create dedicated spaces for user feedback. Keep internals private or open your roadmap to the world.
  • Custom Slugs
    Professional, brandable URLs for every board (e.g., loyalboards.com/b/your-product).
  • Post Management
    Users can easily submit ideas, bugs, or feature requests.

2. Smart Prioritization (Upvoting)

  • Community-Driven Roadmap
    Let your users vote on what matters most.
  • Vote Without Friction
    Users can upvote and post feedback instantly without creating an account.
  • Vote Counting
    Real-time upvote tracking to identify high-impact features at a glance.
  • Engagement Heatmap
    See which posts are gaining traction.

3. Real-time Communication

  • Commenting System
    Deep dive into feedback with threaded comments.
  • Instant Notifications
    Stay updated with real-time alerts for new posts, votes, and comments.
  • Email Integration
    Stay in the loop even when away from the dashboard.

4. Advanced Analytics

  • Performance Tracking
    Monitor board views, post volume, voting activity, and comment density.
  • Engagement Trends
    Visualize how user interaction grows over time with daily granularity.
  • Actionable Insights
    Use data to back your product decisions.

5. Customization & Control

  • Board Settings
    Fine-tune board behavior with flexible "extra settings."
  • Private Post Management
    Handle sensitive feedback or internal notes securely.
  • Filter & Search
    Robust filtering to navigate through hundreds of feedback items.

Tech Stack (Under the Hood)

  • Framework
    Next.js for a fast, SEO-friendly experience.
  • Database
    MongoDB for flexible and scalable data storage.
  • Authentication
    Secure Google OAuth and Email login.
  • Styling
    Sleek, modern UI with Vanilla CSS and responsive design.

articles.title: YouTube Shorts Scripts for LoyalBoards
articles.description: Engaging scripts for promoting LoyalBoards on YouTube Shorts, focusing on key value propositions.
articles.content:
Short 1: The "Guessing Game" Killer

Focus: Upvoting & Prioritization
Hook: Stop building features that nobody uses.

Script:

  • [0-5s] Visual

    Screen recording of a chaotic spreadsheet of "feature ideas".

    Audio

    "Is your feature roadmap a guessing game? Stop using spreadsheets."

  • [5-15s] Visual

    Transition to a sleek LoyalBoards feedback board. Click an upvote button.

    Audio

    "With LoyalBoards, your users tell YOU what to build next. Upvoting makes the impact clear."

  • [15-25s] Visual

    Show the 'Trending' section or high-vote posts.

    Audio

    "No more guesswork. Just data-driven product growth."

  • [25-30s] Visual

    CTA - Logo + "Get Started at LoyalBoards.com"

    Audio

    "Start your board today for free!"

Short 2: The Feedback Loop (Real-time)

Focus: Notifications & Engagement
Hook: 3 seconds to miss a customer. 1 second to keep them loyal.

Script:

  • [0-5s] Visual

    Split screen - User posting feedback vs. Admin getting a notification.

    Audio

    "Your users are talking. Are you listening?"

  • [5-15s] Visual

    Show a real-time notification popping up on the dashboard.

    Audio

    "LoyalBoards gives you real-time alerts. New post? New vote? You're the first to know."

  • [15-25s] Visual

    Admin replying to a comment in the app.

    Audio

    "Engage instantly. Build trust. Close the loop before they even close the tab."

  • [25-30s] Visual

    Mobile view of the app.

    Audio

    "Your community, empowered. LoyalBoards."
